segments.text: I've just got the examination results . I am afraid you haven't passed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no ! I can't have failed . surely ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am afraid so . I am terribly sorry !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whatever am i going to tell me parents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about that , I am sure they will understand . After all , it was a very difficult exam .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can always take it again .
segments.speaker: S1
